questions.question: [Select All]Which of the following stressors are known to overwhelm cyber security personnel?
options: Shortage of skills to fill the needed positions

questions.question: In cyber resilience the business priority is to support “continuous availability”, the expectation is of always-on systems with zero downtime, and at the same time, our systems are more heterogeneous than ever. Which technologies will be critical to solving this expectation and complexity?
options: Orchestration as part of a software-defined resiliency story

questions.question: Which are the five phases for the Cyber Resilience Lifecycle based in NIST CSF?
options: Investigate, Remediate, Protect, Recover, Take legal action

questions.question: The X-Force IRIS Cyber Attack Framework is composed of a Preparation Framework and an Execution Framework.
The attack begins when the cyber bad actor launches and executes the attack.
To solve the main problem of transnational criminals creating cyber threats, we need a human-vs-human approach with intelligence-led cyber threat investigation and hunting.
Cyber Threat Hunting is the act of proactively and aggressively intercepting, tracking and eliminating cyber adversaries as early as possible in the Cyber Kill Chain.

Threat hunting requires a great deal of skill, concentration, collaboration, and more than a little creativity. These are the areas where the human mind excels. But threat hunting also requires the right technology to sift intelligence from a vast seat of data, spot anomalies in system logs and automate the process using a global network of threat intelligence.
